translations.Leave empty for a centered step: Leave empty for a centered step
translations.Are you sure you want to reset to defaul: Are you sure you want to reset to default steps? All custom steps will be removed.

translations.Nice to have you here! This short tour w: Nice to have you here! This short tour will help you get started quickly.
translations.You can close this wizard at any time an: You can close this wizard at any time and open it again later.
translations.This is your main menu. Click here to vi: This is your main menu. Click here to view and manage all your files.
translations.Here you'll find all your photos and alb: Here you'll find all your photos and albums.
translations.Manage your contacts here. You can also: Manage your contacts here. You can also sync them with your phone.
translations.Keep track of all your appointments and: Keep track of all your appointments and events.

Create and manage your to-do lists here.

translations.You're all set to get started!: You're all set to get started!

translations.Start the guided tour again to learn abo: Start the guided tour again to learn about Nextcloud features.
translations.The tour will be restarted. Refresh the: The tour will be restarted. Refresh the page to start.
translations.The introduction tour is currently disab: The introduction tour is currently disabled by your administrator.
translations.Contact your administrator if you would: Contact your administrator if you would like to see the guided tour.
translations.The introduction tour is not available i: The introduction tour is not available in your language.

translations.step_welcome_text:
Nice to have you here! This short tour will help you get started quickly.

You can close this wizard at any time and open it again later.
translations.step_files_text:
This is your main menu. Click here to view and manage all your files.

You can upload files, create folders and share with others.
translations.step_calendar_text:
Here you'll find your personal calendar.

Schedule appointments, set reminders and share your calendar with others.
translations.step_search_text:
With the search bar you can quickly find files, contacts and more.

Just type what you're looking for and press Enter.
translations.step_intro_text:
Nextcloud is your personal cloud storage!

Here you can:

  • üìÅ Upload, share and collaborate on files
  • üìÖ Manage your calendar
  • ‚úâÔ∏è Send and receive email
  • üë• Keep track of contacts
translations.step_features_text:
Navigation:

  • Use the main menu (left) to switch between apps
  • Click on your username (top right) for settings
  • Use the search bar to quickly find files
translations.step_tips_text:
Did you know:

  • You can upload files by dragging them to your browser
  • You can directly share files with a link
  • You can also use Nextcloud as an app on your phone
  • All your data is stored privately and securely
translations.step_complete_text:
You're all set to get started!

If you want to see this tour again, you can find it in your personal settings.

Have fun with Nextcloud!
translations.At least one language must be selected: At least one language must be selected
translations.This will reset the wizard for ALL users: This will reset the wizard for ALL users, including those who have permanently disabled it in their personal settings. Their "disable wizard" preference will be cleared, and the wizard will be shown again on their next login.
translations.Could not load available languages, usin: Could not load available languages, using English only
translations.Using default settings. Save your change: Using default settings. Save your changes to persist them.
translations.Wizard will be shown to all users on the: Wizard will be shown to all users on their next login
translations.This will show the wizard again to all u: This will show the wizard again to all users who have already seen it. Continue?
translations.‚ö†Ô∏è When enabled, you will never see: ‚ö†Ô∏è When enabled, you will never see the introduction tour again, even after app updates. Your administrator can override this setting by using the "Show wizard to all users" button in the admin settings, which will reset your preference and show the wizard again.
translations.Manage wizard steps for each language: Manage wizard steps for each language
translations.Leave empty to show to all users, or sel: Leave empty to show to all users, or select groups to restrict visibility
translations.Wizard usage statistics and telemetry se: Wizard usage statistics and telemetry settings
translations.Help improve IntroVox by sharing anonymo: Help improve IntroVox by sharing anonymous usage statistics.
translations.We collect: step counts per language, us: We collect: step counts per language, user counts, and version info (IntroVox, Nextcloud, PHP). No personal data or step content is shared.
translations.Thank you for helping improve IntroVox!: Thank you for helping improve IntroVox!
translations.Step counts per language (e.g., EN: 8, N: Step counts per language (e.g., EN: 8, NL: 5)
translations.Total user count and active users: Total user count and active users
translations.IntroVox, Nextcloud, and PHP version num: IntroVox, Nextcloud, and PHP version numbers
translations.A unique hash of your instance URL (priv: A unique hash of your instance URL (privacy-friendly identifier)
translations.We collect: step counts per language, us: We collect: step counts per language, user counts, version info (IntroVox, Nextcloud, PHP), and basic server configuration. No personal data or step content is shared.
translations.Basic server configuration (database, OS: Basic server configuration (database, OS, web server, language, timezone)
